artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Published by Unsōdō
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: tan string-bound volume with pastel colored images of people engaged in various activities, and other images of birds, turtles, snails, etc.
markings: back page, ULC, in pencil: [150]; seal back page, LLC
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
text: Meiji-period reproduction. The original is from 1823.
title: Transmitting the Spirit and Revealing the Form of Things: Album of Drawings with One Stroke, complete
